text: Really good pizza! It's Subway for pizza. Large amount of toppings to choose from. Sauce's, Meats, Veggies and more. Definitely recommend the getting the Build Your Own. The staff was friendly fast and the restaurant was clean.

name: Ashley Bell
text: Love this place. Fast service, low prices, good servers. Definitely bang for your buck when you come here. The build your own pizza has a wide variety of sauces, cheese, and toppings. Even if you don't want pizza, there is salad and bread knots as well. Definitely something here for eveyone.

name: Peggy Lee
text: I ordered a gluten free pizza...and then watched them cross contaminate it.  The dipped a ladle in the sauce and touched the dough on a non gluten free pie and put the ladle back in the sauce and used it on my gluten free pizza. They cut the pizza with the same pizza cutter they used on my husband's gluten crust.  It's a shame.

name: Jackie R
text: Just average. The pizza seemed a bit undercooked, and it’s much more expensive than a domino’s/Papa John’s bigger 2-topping pizza would have been. The staff was nice though and the place was spacious and clean. I’d probably come back.
